name: Polaris (itch) (FeatureKreep)
description:
Hailing on all frequencies. This is a distress signal from Station Polaris. A biotechnological virus has infected our ship's neural network. Our defensive mechanisms have been compromised and turned against us. Requesting immediate assistance. Please send help before we ar̵ę̶͇͉̾̒͘ ̴̧̼͕̄̑͠a̴̜̐l̷̛̟̥͉͛l̵͖͖͉͂̂ ̷̲́d̶̹̙͌i̴̹̩͇̒q̶̧̳͇͝p̴̢̢̞̽̽f̴̖̦͒̎͝ṽ̷̲̜̇̊-̵̤̒̏͘=̷̯͐͜

Arrow keys — move
Z — jump
SPACE — dash
X — shoot
CTRL (hold) + arrow keys — create a scrap weapon
C — attack

Art & coding: @FeatureKreep

Music: Meat Automaton
